thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 27 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Actinium Pharmaceuticals Announces Activation Of 16th Clinical Trial Site

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Actinium Pharmaceuticals Announces Activation Of 16th Clinical Trial Site
text:
Feb 27 (Reuters) - Actinium Pharmaceuticals Inc:
* ACTINIUM PHARMACEUTICALS ANNOUNCES ACTIVATION OF SIXTEENTH CLINICAL TRIAL SITE IN THE PIVOTAL PHASE 3 SIERRA TRIAL FOR IOMAB-B
* ACTINIUM PHARMACEUTICALS INC - ACTIVATED SIXTEEN CLINICAL TRIAL SITES IN PHASE 3 SIERRA TRIAL​
* ACTINIUM PHARMACEUTICALS INC - ‍EXPECTS TO PROVIDE UPDATES ON IOMAB-B SIERRA TRIAL IN LINE WITH PREVIOUSLY STATED OBJECTIVES FOR 2018 AND 2019​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
